``` {r}
library(haven)
data <- read_sav("./GSS_spss/gss7224_r2.sav")
```

``` {r}
library(tidyverse)

data %>%
  # Drop missing values
  filter(!is.na(satfin), !is.na(year)) %>%
  
  # Group by year and work status
  group_by(year, satfin) %>%
  
  # Count how many people fall into each category per year
  summarise(n = n(), .groups = "drop_last") %>%
  
  # Compute proportions by year
  mutate(prop = n / sum(n)) %>%
  
  # Plot
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = prop, color = as.factor(satfin))) +
  geom_line(size = 1.2) +
  geom_point(size = 1.5) +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::percent_format()) +
  theme_minimal() 
```
